channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Where top VCs are betting next: Index, Greylock, and Felicis share 2026 priorities at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
item.description: Where are top VCs placing bets in 2026? Hear from Index Ventures’ Nina Achadjian, Greylock’s Jerry Chen, and Felicis’ Viviana Faga on the Builders Sta...

item.title: Plex urges users to change passwords after data breach
item.description: Customers are urged to take action after a database containing scrambled passwords and authentication information was compromised.

item.title: The 15 Best Fans to Cool You Year Round (2025)
item.description: From tower and pedestal styles to utilitarian box fans, these are our WIRED-tested favorites.

item.title: Hasan Piker Will Never Run for Office
item.description: The Twitch streamer could pivot from influencer to candidate. But he tells WIRED’s Big Interview podcast he’d rather use his platform to tell Dems “yo...

item.title: Nuclearn gets $10.5M to help the nuclear industry embrace AI
item.description: Nuclearn has developed AI tools to help reactor operators automate routine paperwork. "Think of it as the junior employee," the company tells customer...

item.title: The United Arab Emirates Releases a Tiny But Powerful AI Model
item.description: K2 Think compares well with reasoning models from OpenAI and DeepSeek but is smaller and more efficient, say researchers based in Abu Dhabi.

item.title: Geothermal is too expensive, but Dig Energy’s impossibly small drill rig might fix that
item.description: Dig Energy's water-jet drilling right promises to cut drilling costs by up to 80%, helping geothermal heating hit price parity with fossil fuel furnac...
